Hospital.Treatments
Class Treatment

java.lang.Object
  Hospital.Treatments.Treatment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Result, Appointable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cast, Medication, Surgery
public abstract class Treatment
extends Object
implements Result, Appointable

Provides common functionality and an interface for the different kinds of treatment provided in the hospital.

Field Summary
private  Appointment appointment
          The appointment associated with this treatment
private  Command delayedCommand
          The command to create, schedule and undo the appointment Also to reserve needed items.
private  boolean resultEntered
          Indicates whether the result for this Treatment has been entered

getScheduleGroups

public List<MultiScheduleGroup> getScheduleGroups()
Description copied from interface: Appointable
Returns the resources of the hospital that are needed for this Appointable. These include normally: a nurse and a machine.
